overview: This project demonstrates how to extract hidden periodic patterns from microscope images using frequency-domain (Fourier Transform) analysis. It also corrects for non-uniform illumination to reveal subtle repeating structures.
goals: Extract the periodic pattern that is (vaguely) visible in the input image.
Remove the impact of non-uniform illumination.
method: Read the input image from the current directory.
Apply a frequency-domain filter (Fourier Transform) to isolate the dominant periodic components.
Display the frequency-domain filter used for extraction.
Extract and display the periodic pattern.
Correct for non-uniform illumination and display the uniformly illuminated input image.
